20101208112619.000|20101208112621.000|CCO|REPUBLICANS OVER EXPIRING TAX

20101208112626.000|20101208112628.500|CCO|BY SOME CONGRESSIONAL DEMOCRATS.
20101208112628.500|20101208112651.000|CCO|THIS IS HALF AN HOUR.
20101208112651.000|20101208112701.000|CCO|>> I WANT TO DO WHAT IS RIGHT

20101208112719.571|20101208112721.000|CCO|THIS IS WHAT PROMISED.

20101208112723.000|20101208112725.000|CCO|THE CAMPAIGN AND AS PRESIDENT.

20101208112733.500|20101208112736.000|CCO|PUT FOOD ON THEIR TABLE.
20101208112736.000|20101208112738.500|CCO|IN EXCHANGE FOR A TEMPORARY
20101208112738.500|20101208112741.000|CCO|EXTENSION OF THE HIGH INCOME TAX
20101208112741.000|20101208112743.500|CCO| BREAKS, A POLICY I
20101208112743.500|20101208112746.000|CCO|APPLAUSE BUT THAT REPUBLICANS

20101208112759.000|20101208112801.000|CCO|NUMBER ONE, IF YOU ARE A PARENT
20101208112801.000|20101208112802.667|CCO|TRYING TO RAISE YOUR CHILD OR A

20101208112809.333|20101208112811.000|CCO|BUSINESS LOOKING TO INVEST AND
20101208112811.000|20101208112813.000|CCO|GROW, AND YOU WILL HAVE A TAX
20101208112813.000|20101208112815.000|CCO|CUT NEXT YEAR.
20101208112815.000|20101208112817.000|CCO|THIRD, AS A RESULT OF THIS
20101208112817.000|20101208112819.000|CCO|AGREEMENT, WE WILL CUT PAYROLL
20101208112819.000|20101208112821.000|CCO|TAXES IN 2011 WHICH WILL ADD
20101208112821.000|20101208112823.500|CCO|ABOUT $1,000 TO THE TAKE HOME

20101208112846.000|20101208112848.500|CCO|I KNOW THERE ARE SOME WHO WOULD

20101208113334.333|20101208113336.000|CCO|>> WHAT ABOUT THE LAST TWO

20101208113337.667|20101208113339.333|CCO|WAS THERE A FAILURE ON THE PART
20101208113339.333|20101208113341.000|CCO|OF THE DEMOCRATIC LEADERSHIP ON
20101208113341.000|20101208113343.000|CCO|THE HILL OR HEAR THAT YOU COULD
20101208113343.000|20101208113345.000|CCO|NOT PRECLUDE THESE CUTS GOING
20101208113345.000|20101208113347.000|CCO|FORWARD?
20101208113347.000|20101208113349.000|CCO|>> ON THE REPUBLICAN SIDE, THIS
20101208113349.000|20101208113351.000|CCO|IS THEIR HOLY GRAIL.
20101208113351.000|20101208113354.333|CCO|THESE TAX CUTS FOR THE WEALTHY.
20101208113354.333|20101208113357.667|CCO|THIS SEEMS TO BE THERE CENTRAL
20101208113357.667|20101208113401.000|CCO|ECONOMIC DOCTRINE.
20101208113401.000|20101208113403.000|CCO|ON LESS WE HAD 60 VOTES IN THE
20101208113403.000|20101208113405.000|CCO|SENATE AT ANY GIVEN TIME, IT
